parameter.name: protoMessage
parameter.description: Name of the proto message that will be serialized on the input port.

parameter.name: protoRootFile
parameter.description: Root proto file within proto directory that contains the root message (must be relative)

parameter.name: protoDirectory
parameter.description: Directory that contains the proto files (if relative, it is relative to the data directory or the application directory if data directory is not set).
